it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects

Interface Semantics.Plane<D extends Semantics.Descriptor>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the class to refer to, for manipulating the semantic structure. It must extends: Semantics.Descriptor.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Semantics, Semantics.Orientable<D>, Semantics.Primitive<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MORPlane
    Enclosing interface:
    Semantics

    public static interface Semantics.Plane<D extends Semantics.Descriptor>
extends Semantics.Orientable<D>
    This interface represents the class that should describe a planar object.

    In particular, a Plane is an extension of an Semantics.Orientable object. Thus, is semantically defined as:

    • a Semantics.Primitive describing:
      • the instantiation time,
      • the object unique identifier,
      • the 3D coordinate of the center of mass.
    • an Semantics.Orientable describing:
      • The axis direction.
    • The hessian coefficient.

    Where the hessian coefficient is 'd' such that: ax + by + cd + d = 0.
    While the 'a', 'b' and 'c' coefficients are described by the components of the direction of the plane normal (see Semantics.Orientable.getAxis()).

    File: it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics

    date: 06/01/2017
    See Also:
